expr_nbinom2: negative binomial test for gene expression

Function test_nbinom computes statistics and p-values for negative binomial test.

test_nbinom2(data, condition, ...)

Arguments

data

data frame containing the raw counts of sequencing reads. Columns corresponds to genes, rows to samples.
condition

vector of levels coresponding to order of samples in data.

Value

A data frame with the following columns:

id

The ID of the observable, taken from the row names of the counts slots.

exp.mean

The base mean.

exp.log.fold

The log2 of the fold change.

exp.pval

The p-values for rejecting the null hypothesis about the means equality.

exp.padj

The adjusted p-values (adjusted with 'p.adjust( pval, method="BH")')

exp.mean.gr1

The base mean for the counts for the first condition.

exp.mean.gr2

The base mean for the counts for the second condition.

exp.fold

The ratio mean.gr1/mean.gr2.

See also

mety_t
